alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 06 at 11:47PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CHST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Guam. * WHEN...Until 245 AM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1142 PM ChST, gauge reports indicated rainfall between 0.5 and 1 inches. Intermittent rain through the night will cause small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. - Expect another 0.5 inches of rain per hour over the area. This additional rain will continue to produce minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.
